words.defineEn: a room that we pay to occupy in a hotel
words.defineVi: một căn phòng mà chúng tôi trả tiền để ở trong một khách sạn

examples: This type of heater uses a lot of electricity.
Some common types of cooking oils include canola oil, vegetable oil, and sunflower oil.
Strawberries and blueberries are my favorite types of berries.
Max is a different type of a person.
Multipolar neurons are the most common type of neuron found in the brain and spinal cord.
words.defineEn: a class or group of people or things that have common characteristics or share particular qualities
words.defineVi: một lớp hoặc nhóm người hoặc vật có đặc điểm chung hoặc chia sẻ những phẩm chất cụ thể

examples: The companies are two of a kind.
Thank you, you're very kind.
My aunt is a really kind sister to my father.
Thank you for your kind words, they made my day.
The lost child was helped by a kind police officer to find their way home.
words.defineEn: a group of people or things that have similar characteristics or share particular qualities
words.defineVi: một nhóm người hoặc những thứ có đặc điểm tương tự hoặc chia sẻ phẩm chất cụ thể

examples: She sent the kids to bed early.
The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
The sofa had to serve as a bed.
I have a bedside table next to my bed for my books and glasses.
I usually go to bed around 11 o'clock.
words.defineEn: furniture we use to sleep on that normally has a frame and mattress
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất chúng ta sử dụng để ngủ thường có khung và nệm

examples: Many hotels don't do single rooms at all.
You have to pay extra for a single room.
We've expanded the range, so now instead of cleaning a single room, it can actually clean your whole home up to 1000 square feet.
Yes, I don't think you need to have open captions in every single room on every single movie, but if you're gonna have closed captions, yeah, they need to be.
words.defineEn: a hotel room or bedroom used by just one person
words.defineVi: một phòng khách sạn hoặc phòng ngủ chỉ được sử dụng bởi một người

examples: Hotel prices start at €80 for a double room.
words.defineEn: a room in a hotel for two people; a bedroom designed to be used by two people
words.defineVi: một phòng trong khách sạn dành cho hai người; một phòng ngủ được thiết kế để được sử dụng bởi hai người

examples: The suite will add a touch of class to your bedroom.
Here's your suite for today's flight.
In first class, passengers get a whole suite to themselves.
Welcome to the master suite.
Among other things, their suite of instruments will study the environment created by the Sun’s solar wind on the lunar soil.
words.defineEn: a series of rooms, particularly in a hotel
words.defineVi: một loạt các phòng, đặc biệt là trong một khách sạn

words.defineEn: an area in a public place, such as hotels, restaurants, or offices, that people can use to smoke in
words.defineVi: một khu vực ở nơi công cộng, chẳng hạn như khách sạn, nhà hàng hoặc văn phòng, mà mọi người có thể sử dụng để hút thuốc

examples: This is a non-smoking dorm.
The non-smoking queen thing was when John Mulaney, he and I were touring together
I remember there's a non-smoking queen joke.
and I was checking into a hotel and this is just real, they said one of our rooms is a non-smoking queen.
words.defineEn: of a place where smoking is prohibited
words.defineVi: của một nơi cấm hút thuốc

examples: Check out to book for more info and also for citations on the ads that were run in the 19th century against workhouses and in the 20th century for twin beds!
Max Jensen on Youtube also asked about the promotion of separate sleep in workhouses and why twin beds were portrayed as ideal in the 20th century.
words.defineEn: one of a pair of single beds in a hotel or guest room for two people
words.defineVi: một trong những cặp giường đơn trong khách sạn hoặc phòng dành cho hai người

examples: It's a store specializing in queen-size clothing.
If anybody has a queen-size bed, I have a down comforter.
words.defineEn: (of beds, mattresses, beddings etc.) smaller than a king-sized bed but larger than a double bed, with the dimensions of about 150 cm by 200 cm
words.defineVi: (giường, đệm, khăn trải giường, v.v.) nhỏ hơn giường cỡ lớn nhưng lớn hơn giường đôi, với kích thước khoảng 150 cm x 200 cm

words.defineEn: (of beds, mattresses, beddings etc.) larger than a queen-size bed, with the dimensions of about 190 cm by 200 cm
words.defineVi: (của giường, đệm, khăn trải giường, v.v.) lớn hơn giường cỡ Queen, với kích thước khoảng 190 cm x 200 cm

words.defineEn: a bed that has wheels and can be folded in half for easy storage
words.defineVi: một chiếc giường có bánh xe và có thể gấp làm đôi để cất giữ dễ dàng
